en: Peppa and George are playing at Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在猪爷爷和猪奶奶家里玩。

en: Grandpa! Catch!
Catch!
What's this?
A dinosaur!
Grandpa, what are you doing?
I'm planting these seeds.
Seeds? What do seeds do?
Seeds grow into plants.
I just make a little hole and put the seed in.
zh: 我先挖个小坑然后把种子放进去。

en: Then I cover it with earth and water it.
Everything in my garden grows from tiny seeds like these.
zh: 我花园里所有东西都是从这样小的种子长成的。

en: Even the big apple tree?
zh: 连那个大苹果树也是吗？

en: Oh! Yes!
This tiny seed will grow into a little apple tree, like this.
zh: 这小小的种子会长成一棵小苹果树，就像这棵。

en: Oh.
And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.
zh: 然后这些小苹果树会长成像这样大的苹果树。

en: And inside this apple are more seeds.
zh: 而且这苹果里还有很多这样的种子。

en: To make more apple trees!
zh: 可以长出更多的苹果树！

en: Exactly!
Grandpa! Grandpa! I want to plant a seed!
zh: 爷爷！爷爷！我想种一粒种子！

en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed?
zh: 你想不想种粒草莓种子？

en: Yes, please!
This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
zh: 这个种子会长成一棵可爱的草莓。

en: First, make a little hole.
Then I put the seed in and cover it with earth.
zh: 然后我把种子放在里面再埋上土。

en: Shall I water it for you?
No! No! I want to water it.
zh: 不要！不要！我想自己来浇水。

en: Good! Now we wait for it to grow.
zh: 好的！现在我们来等它长大。

en: Peppa and George are waiting for the seed to grow.
zh: 佩奇和乔治等着种子发芽。

en: It's not doing anything!
You will have to be patient, Peppa.
It will take a long time to grow.
zh: 它需要很长的时间才能发芽。

en: Peppa! George! It's time to go home.
zh: 佩奇，乔治，是时候回家了！

en: But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow!
zh: 但是我在等着我的草莓发芽！

en: I wanted strawberries for teas.
zh: 我还等着草莓来泡茶呢。

en: Don't worry, Peppa.
Next time you come,
the seed will have grown into a plant.
zh: 这些种子就会长成草莓苗。

en: And we will have strawberries!
Yes.
Come on, Peppa.
Bye bye, Grandpa.Bye bye, strawberry.
zh: 再见，爷爷。 再见，草莓。

en: Grandpa Pig looks after Peppa's strawberry plant.
zh: 猪爷爷照看着佩奇的草莓苗。

en: After many days, Grandpa Pig finds a tiny plant growing.
zh: 过了几天，猪爷爷发现一棵小幼苗长出来了。

en: Day by day, the plant grows bigger and bigger.
zh: 日复一日，草莓苗越长越大。

en: Then one day, Grandpa Pig finds something very special.
zh: 然后有一天，猪爷爷发现了一些特别的东西。

en: Strawberries!
Grandpa! We're back!
Peppa and George have come to play again.
Grandpa! Grandpa! Did my plant grow?
zh: 爷爷！爷爷！我的草莓苗长大了吗？

en: Yes! Look!
Strawberries!
Thank you, Grandpa!
Grandpa, can we plant something else?
zh: 爷爷，我们能不能种点别的呢？

en: Yes! Now, it's George's turn to choose.
zh: 可以！现在，轮到乔治选了。

en: Yes! You choose, George.
Choose... a carrot!
Grandpa, I think George wants to grow a carrot.
zh: 爷爷，我想乔治想种胡萝卜。

en: George, would you like to grow a carrot?
No!
What would you like to grow?
George has thought of something he wants to grow.
zh: 乔治想到他想种的东西了。

en: George wants to grow a dinosaur tree!
Silly George!
Dinosaurs don't grow on trees.
zh: 恐龙是不会长成恐龙树的。
